thread.title: Caravel Minerals raises funds to advance copper-molybdenum-gold project
thread.title_full: Caravel Minerals raises funds to advance copper-molybdenum-gold project | MENAFN.COM

author: ProactiveInvestors  Australia
title: Caravel Minerals raises funds to advance copper-molybdenum-gold project
text:
(MENAFN - ProactiveInvestors) Caravel Minerals ( ASX:CVV ) has raised 980940 through the issue of 122991429 shares under the first tranche of a placement to raise 1.45 million.

Issue of the remaining 67285718 shares and 103710003 attaching options exercisable at 0.013 on or before 31st January 2017 is subject to shareholder approval.

Proceeds will be used for additional working capital and to support and supplement the funds being invested in the companyâ€™s flagship Calingiri copper-molybdenum-gold project in Western Australia as part of a definitive Farm-In Agreement with First Quantum Minerals Limited.

First Quantum is expending 3.6 million to earn a 50.1% interest in the Calingiri Project. This along with the raising will see the company fully funded for the coming 24 months.


Proactive Investors Australia is the market leader in producing news articles and research reports on ASX emerging companies with distribution in Australia UK North America and Hong Kong / China.
